query:
UPDATE dao_proposals SET
                id = $1,
                proposal_id = $2,
                description = $3,
                kind = $4,
                kind_variant_name = $5,
                proposer = $6,
                status = $7,
                submission_time = $8,
                vote_counts = $9,
                votes = $10,
                total_votes = $11,
                approvers = $12,
                dao_instance = $13,
                proposal_action = $14,
                tx_timestamp = $15,
                hash = $16,
                block_height = $17,
                receiver_id = $18,
                token_id = $19,
                token_amount = $20
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING id
